column4: I have one other silly question. I have my Ubuntu hostname set as thoth - but other computers on my network don't recognize this, and say invalid hostname. However, it recognizes other computers, such as my OS X machine named setesh - is there something I need to do to get other computers to associate my Ubuntu machine's hostname with its IP?
I'm not sure but I think that this feature (with dhcp) is not yet enabled in Feisty, but is (and will be) in Gutsy
Can I enable it myself, or is it simply not there?
